artifact.name: noinputoutputdport
artifact.summary: Data port must be either input or output.

artifact.name: aactornodport
artifact.summary: Actor must have at least one port on its interface, or each version must contain at least one port.

artifact.name: hasAtomicVersion
artifact.summary: Atomic actor must have at least one version.

artifact.name: hasTopologyVersion
artifact.summary: Topology must have at least one version.

artifact.name: connectoionwithinputport
artifact.summary: Each connection must have at least one input port.

artifact.name: connectionwithoutputport
artifact.summary: Each connection must have one and only one port.

artifact.name: attributewithdatahasvalue
artifact.summary: Any attribute tagged as with data must have at least one associated value.

artifact.name: multipleportexport
artifact.summary: Cannot export the same port more than one time.

artifact.name: attributemultiplevalues2
artifact.summary: There cannot be distinct values for the same attribute under the same version or actor instance.

artifact.name: allactorswithversions
artifact.summary: Every actor instance in a topology must have a version selected via a defver

artifact.name: allVersionAInstancesWithVer
artifact.summary: All actor instances contained in every version must have a defined version.

artifact.name: portwithouttype
artifact.summary: Missing data type for data port.

artifact.name: exclusiveConNames
artifact.summary: Atomic component has at least 2 connections with the same name linked to its ports.
